transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan Aditya batao aap.
Executive: Accha mam main ye keh raha tha jaise main jisse saman le raha hu abhi.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: First party ko maine payment kiya hua hai.
Customer: Aur wo kya hai maal deliver nahi ho pa raha hai mam.
Executive: Matlab aapne us usne kisi party ne aapko order diya hai?
Customer: Haan maine matlab maine maal liya hai.
Customer: Main bheja customer samne wali party ke liye 57000 ka maine maal liya hua hai use maine payment kar diya usne mujhe saman nahi bheja hai abhi.
Executive: Abhi tak nahi bheja hai? Kitna time usne timing kitni batai thi?
Customer: Usne aaj dopahar 12:00 1:00 baje tak ki uski last baat hui hai ki itne baje tak aapko saman mil jayega.
Executive: To aapke paas number hai uska?
Customer: Ji mam hai.
Executive: Aap mujhe maine shayad aapko batana bhul gayi but maine I think bataya bhi hoga Aditya ki kabhi bhi hume full payment nahi karni hai.
Executive: Hum agar saman de rahe hai samne wale ko hum jante hi nahi hai to hum kaise full payment kar denge? Amazon se mam aapko app ke through jata hai.
Customer: Mam ab wo issue aa raha hai isme.
Customer: To bhi mam full payment na hua hai to bhi usme mam kafi payment hai ye 57000 ka full payment nahi hai ye.
Executive: Full nahi hai 57 aapki half hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To uska number mam ab main aapko number call receive nahi karna kya wo?
Customer: Abhi abhi uska abhi just do baar call kiye abhi pick up nahi hue.
Executive: Call pick nahi kariye aap ek ek to aap ek kaam kariye ga ki aap uska number mujhe whatsapp karo.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan aur dusri cheez main aapko abhi dobara se call karungi aapne ye 9696 wale pe call kiya tha kya?
Customer: Ji mam kiya tha abhi just thoda der hua.
Executive: Suno aap na mere personal number pe hamesha call kiya karo us number pe mat kiya karo kyuki ye yahan se call forward hoke hamare paas aati hai to ye lambi process ho jata hai to mujhe sari cheeze isme alag tarike se mention karke isko close karna padega.
Customer: Nahi nahi mam koi baat nahi par mam mera abhi ye situation bahut jyada typical hua hai isme mujhe samajh mein nahi aa raha tha kya kare aapko do baar call kiya.
Executive: Actually pehle to main meeting haan pehle to main meeting mein thi fir mujhe dusre client ki call aa gayi thi.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan abhi koi baat nahi main aap mujhe ek to apna jo number hai uska wo mujhe whatsapp karna aur second thing ki apne number se aap use call mat karna thoda wait karo aapke paas koi alternative number hoga aapke father ka hoga aap usse usko call karna thode time baad aap at least abhi aadhe ghante ka break lo main to apne number se karungi usko agar uthata hai to achi baat hai hai na main jaake usko pehle call karti hu agar usme ye cheez aap mujhe uska naam bataoge?
Customer: Mam maine abhi aapko mujhe sari details aap mujhe whatsapp pe uska naam number dono cheeze bhej dena.
Customer: Mam maine abhi aapko pura pura text message kiya hai unka jo bill aaya hua hai wo maine aapko share kiya hai payment jitna hua hai wo maine aapko share kiya hua hai sara.
Executive: Wo sari cheeze aur ye aap IndiaMART se ye aapne IndiaMART se kisi ko uthaya tha ya fir koi other jagah se aapki baat hui hai?
Customer: IndiaMART se uthaya hua hai ye.
Executive: IndiaMART se uthaya.
Executive: Koi matlab aapne hi koi buyer search kara koi seller search kiya tha saman ke liye?
Customer: Ji mam usne ye contact mujhse liya hua hai.
Executive: Thik hai aur aapne ye sari details check kari thi ki wo kitne time se IndiaMART pe hai ya kis type ka hai wo aapne dekha tha?
Customer: Mam mujhe so nahi hua.
Executive: Very haan wahi galti ho gayi na fir.
Executive: Kabhi bhi hume jab hum kisi se bhi contact nahi karna hai plus payment ka thoda dhyan rakh ke chalo.
Customer: Chalo mam abhi abhi to mam isme dekhiye aap kya ho sakta hai iska contact ka is cheez ko aap thoda dekhiye.
Executive: Haan iska main iska to main dekhti hu aur aap mujhe ye bataiye ki isme aapke kuch apni details wagera li thi kya?
Customer: Kya mam?
Executive: Isne koi alag se aapne details mangi thi?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji mam dekh raha hu.
Executive: Haan Aditya main ye bol rahi hu usne alag se koi details to nahi mangi thi aapse?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi aur koi nahi hai payment hi hue hai.
Executive: Payment hi hua hai sirf aap mujhe payments ka screenshot bhi share kar dena.
Customer: Mam dono share kiya hua hai.
Executive: Thik hai main wo dekh lungi aur agar meri call receive nahi karta hai aapko isme tension lene ki zarurat nahi hai main apni legal team ko forward karwa dungi koi dikkat nahi hogi.
Executive: Hai na?
Customer: Haan main legal team hai na usko forward karwa dungi aapke ye sara sara issue.
Customer: Mam baat hui hai na.
Executive: Haan main nahi hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Haan mam namaste.
Executive: Namaste main main inka father bol raha hu.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aditya ka.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan ye keh rahe jaise hum ye Dabra ke jo address unka show ho bataya tha inhone Dabra ka tha.
Customer: Dabra MP.
Customer: Dabra.
Customer: Dabra district Dabra MP.
Executive: Accha accha accha MP se hai.
Customer: Ji MP hum bhi MP se hi hai hamare yahan se 140 kilometer hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Agar kisi madhyam se inse baat ho jaye to hum inko Dabra mein hi to koi bhi baat hum Dabra mein hi kisi vyakti ko inke paas pahuncha denge.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Ji main apni side se pehle inko main pehle contact karti hu unko agar unka kuch response aata hai to thik hai.
Customer: Mam mam.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Aap apni side se thoda dekhiye kya hai mera to abhi dimag kaam nahi kar raha hai is condition thoda.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir koi baat nahi main karti hu thik hai.
Customer: Ji mam.
Executive: Okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's paid order not delivered yet.

- Customer made a partial payment of ₹57,000.

- Customer is unable to contact the seller.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for the seller's details on WhatsApp.

- Executive will try to contact the seller.

- Executive assured legal team support if needed.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer back.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, order, delivery, payment, legal team
